game.name: RV There Yet?
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 캠핑카를 집까지 운전하는 협동 어드벤처 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A co-op adventure about driving your Recreational Vehicle home.

reviewHighlights.text: You know, mostly I genuinely enjoy playing “play-with-friends” style games, even if they are a bit broken and mediocre, but this the first game that I...
Fun multiplayer. We play this as a family that live in different regions. We spend hours laughing .
